item.title: DeepCoder delivers top coding performance in efficient 14B open model
item.description: DeepCoder-14B competes with frontier models like o3 and o1—and the weights, code, and optimization platform are open source.

item.title: NTT launches physics of AI group and AI inference chip design for 4K video
item.description: NTT Research announced at an event that it has started a new AI basic research group, dubbed the Physics of Artificial Intelligence Group.
